title: Almost 30.
body:
Hello, I am The Fire On Fire. I will soon level up to lvl 30, so I am looking for people to play with. I have heard of 'elo hell' before, and I know that it means getting matched up with afks/trolls/feeders (and yes i know by now that it does not exist). I play mid, top, adc, supp. Last time I have jungled in pre-season 5, i kept getting executed because of poor leashes ( so that means I don't jungle unless i am with a good team).  I like to play fizz, and my kda (average) with him is 22/6.5/9.5 (check on lolking.net - The Fire On Fire: http://www.lolking.net/summoner/na/59982106) Last time I played supp my KDA was 1/5/17, My kda with tanks is 4.5/6/3.5. I'm not sure about adcs. Thank you for reading, I'm out.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I search worthy prey. - Kha'Zix

replies.body: I JUST turned lvl 30, and I feel like either Ranked is way overexxagerated, or Promos are just the best part. I have played 2 games, and EVERYONE was kind and always said "pref" before their choice of lane. Even after I went 1/7/4 as Nami(a somewhat bad score), the Cait just said "Shit happens sometimes, and it's just one game." So while I shouldn't have fed, at least my team was nice about it. Maybe we could play sometime!

> [{quoted}](name=Hudson Gaga,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=Inm1yUoz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-11T17:04:08.621+0000)
>
> I JUST turned lvl 30, and I feel like either Ranked is way overexxagerated, or Promos are just the best part. I have played 2 games, and EVERYONE was kind and always said "pref" before their choice of lane. Even after I went 1/7/4 as Nami(a somewhat bad score), the Cait just said "Shit happens sometimes, and it's just one game." So while I shouldn't have fed, at least my team was nice about it. Maybe we could play sometime!

A bit of advice, don't jump into ranked after just turning 30.

Thank you for the advice, I will remember (and yea i know that you didn't quote me)

It's not like elo hell has all the afk'rs/ragers/trolls etc., it's at all elo's.... Low plat to diamond get very upset.
